title: Measurement: Perimeter and Area

vocab.definition: The amount of space inside a shape
A unit used to measure area
How long something is (one side of a rectangle)
How wide something is (the other side of a rectangle)

teachingNotes: Use grids, unit squares, and real measurements. Contrast 'around' (perimeter) vs 'inside' (area).
